name: STINK TANK
description:
This is a game by some blokes named Steven and Matt, with Music by Rory

It features rogue-lite aspects with several procedural levels, some choices, and maybe a good old tank boss fight!

Let us know what you think! Hope you enjoy it :)

Controls are as follows (mouse and keyboard only):

Movement: WASD but tank controls

Cannon: Left Mouse Button

Machine Gun: Space Bar

Harpoon: Right Mouse Button

Sprint: Shift

Interact: E
